description.translate: Walk in his footsteps, and never again will you fail.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§9Chaussure de l'immortel\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Marchez dans ses pas, et jamais\"}","{\"text\":\"§7plus vous ne faillirez.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Walk in his footsteps,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7and never again will you fail.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7RES§a1 §7STR§c-1\"}"]}}
